lines.text: I add it to party funds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am searching the ogres, and I keep the 24 gold, but I give two to Vax.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go and grab shards of the broken glass of the case?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to, yeah. So mark that in your inventory, you have some hand-sized shards of broken glass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And two to Pike for healing me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else you guys wish to do in this section?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we searched the ogres, that's it. I guess we should just start walking further down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You take a poo on the black puddle of acid?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think-- Well, no. That's the only heat source, that's the only lava there was, and now it's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And now it has cooled, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all right, I think it's worth it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to take a hit dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and do that. As many as you'd like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's rest for a half-hour or so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take a moment, you can spend any hit dice now that you need to to heal yourself. Just make sure to mark how many you've used.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just hear the sounds of ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a large waterfall pouring down from above--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are on the outskirts of where the next tunnel opens up, where there are a few small streams of lava pouring from the ceiling. You look above, and you can see the top of the downward cavern. There's the giant lake beneath. And across the way, you can see the waterfall where Clarota was originally discovered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we should go pick up Trinket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At least you get your bear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to get your bear killed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you explain? I don't think I understand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you explain with your map, Matt?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're at the bottom of the cave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I get we doubled back, but it would help the visual, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah so-- and I'll have more of this for you guys next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The path you guys took was essentially-- lead to this back area, which I'll draw for next week, and a tunnel that curved all the way around and exited right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, we'll go get your bear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll go get Trinket, and then we'll go down the path we should have gone down in the first place next week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there, like, any other way down here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other than the fact you've completely destroyed one of the mind flayer generals as well as the one helming the war camp above. You've acquired new magical items and defeated one of the abominations that was created for the siege war. I think you accomplished quite a few things, though maybe not as directly as you were hoping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you, taking the flying carpet, it's a very precarious journey as the weight limit for the carpet--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's with me, and he cast Featherfall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket awkwardly (bear noises) manages to swim her way down to the bottom floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you make your way to the base of the watery lake, at the bottom, you can see a swish to the water, and a very familiar sight briefly shows itself in the distance. As you see a slick domed fish-like head protrude with a few tentacles in the distance, you all instinctively step quite a distance away, and it seems to withdraw back into the water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I-- While I see it real quick, I'm going to go ahead and channel and cast Beast Sense through it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing bestial of it. This is not a natural creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota once again whispers to the rest of you, "Stay at bay. The Aboleth is dangerous."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all step back and turn now into the the tunnel that extends further into the heart of this mountain. You see streams of lava pouring from the top occasionally, and one central flow of molten rock tends to fill half of the cavern, like a small river heading down into the base of the mountain. This is very familiar to you, as it's the path that your dream took you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We spent a whole game doing--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we took a wrong turn, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. We were flexing our muscles a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus you got us new armor out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys begin to step into the next lengths of your subterranean journey, we'll pick that up next week. Thank you all so much for tuning into Critical Role.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some tense battles. An intense encounter choice on you guys' part. Well done on that.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: All right, so. Amy was the winner of our first giveaway.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I ask whoever hasn't signed this, we're going to pass it around to all sign it for Amy.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: As a thank-you for Amy, she's an avid fan.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: As a personal challenge, guys, from me to you, I think we are, what are we, 18 away, Lucas?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Okay, so we've got a little bit of a ways to go, but I'm going to go ahead and have these guys sign this one as well, and I'm going to push you guys that by the end of tonight, if we reach 1,550, I'll go ahead and throw this in with the next promo kit, as well. And if not I'll hang onto it for myself, and I won.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Thank you guys so much. That was fun. It gets more intense like every week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's apparently the path this is taking, so--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And just so you guys know, that was the chat room that decided on your fate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, second week in a row.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So come and watch. Hopefully you'll be there for one of those episodes. Put your friends together, vote for the creature you want to see them fight, and if a TPK happens, not my fault, it's totally on you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that a total party kill?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So, guys, we're not going to go offline just now. We're going to stick around for a little while. We're going to throw it up while we move some cameras, so I'm going to leave it up to the chat room. It's up to you guys, we can either come back and play some Bloodborne on the PS4 that you guys bought us, or we can come back and play some Just Dance 2014 that you guys also bought us. So there's dancing or Bloodborne. It's up to you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dancing is fun to watch, Bloodborne just to watch him get really, really angry.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I don't get angry. Lucas gets angry, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This game, the beginning of this game will make you angry. All right, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't get angry? Have you played Dark Souls or Demon Souls? Because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Demon Souls mimics, man, I know the pain you're in for.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: What was it like, Bachee or something like that? Man, that game pissed me off.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Wings of-- ire, ear, something like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, I know what you're talking about.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Man, that was heavy. Would any of you guys be interested in sticking around to dance a round or two if we were to go to Just Dance? It's a nightly staple here. We end the nights with dancing. I don't know if you guys have seen that ridiculousness, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who would want to stick around for that?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: They're all shivering in fear, you guys

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How soon will that start? I'll stay for 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can stay for a little bit.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I bet they're are all going to ask for dancing now.

lines.name: LUCAS
lines.text: See a lot of Bloodborne, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I live for Bloodborne, man.
